advantage.title: The synergy «Gazprom Neft» and «Zyfra» gives us advantages:
advantage.text: We develop and implement an industrial IoT platform for the oil refining and chemical industries. The platform allows an enterprise to combine all industrial data to maximize the economic impact of using IoT technologies, ML and modern functional application architecture. The presence of the platform significantly speeds up the creation and implementation of products that increase the efficiency of technological processes. Microservice architecture makes it possible to use solutions from different developers while maintaining overall process traceability.
advantage.factoryCard: Fast assessment of hypotheses and effects of decisions due to application on the operating production
advantage.architectureCard: Continuous updating of architecture of products, due to understanding of today's perspective of business
advantage.directyCard: Improvement of a product in the mode of non-feet, due to direct contact with the business user

tasks.title: We help business to solve such problems as:
tasks.task1: Creation of a uniform digital layer at the enterprise
tasks.task2: Monitoring and visualization of data of the enterprise
tasks.task5: Identification of losses at speed with production

definition.title: The digital industrial platform is:
definition.quality: Experience more than 10 years of development and deployment of industrial decisions
definition.integration: Ability to integrate with other decisions
definition.code: More than 1 million lines of a code

education.title: Training and partnership
education.textTop: Within development of a product we care for creation of community of business users of our platform and services. For our partners and clients the training courses for experts of introduction and developers are provided.
education.textBottom: If it is interesting to you to undergo this training, please, leave the application:

formDescription.text: Leave the contacts here, and we will contact you to tell how digital decisions can increase safety and efficiency of your enterprise.

feedbackForm.agreementTop: Pressing the Send button, you agree with our Privacy policy.
feedbackForm.agreementBottom: We do not share information with the third parties.
feedbackForm.consent: I give the consent to processing of personal data
feedbackForm.subscrip: I want to obtain relevant information on products of the company and professional actions in email mailings

head.title: Digital Industrial Platform
head.description: We develop and introduce the industrial IoT-platform for oil-processing and chemical industry. The platform allows the enterprise to unite all industrial data to maximize economic effect of use of technologies IoT, ML and modern functional architecture of applications. Existence of the platform much accelerates creation and introduction of the products increasing efficiency of technological repartitions.

validation.requered: The field is obligatory for filling
